subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN2709, how did it go?
description_text: Is this a joke? Unless you solve the missing parts my review is going to be bad bad. El 10 oct 2025, a la(s) 4:08 p. m., SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> escribió: ﻿ Hello Juan, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. conversations.body_text: ID 号为 4728 和 4729 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单4728  
      主题: Re: Order #SSN2709, how did it go?  
      描述:  
 It came with NO brackets to attach the haptics to the pedals!!!! The web clearly states that the haptics come with two brackets (one for throttle brake and one for clutch). How is it possible. How can i use it with no brackets?!?! I bought both the pedals and the haptics in the same order. This is unbelievable!!! 
 
  El 9 oct 2025, a la(s) 4:33 p. m., SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> escribió:  
 
 
  ﻿




 
 Hello Juan,  We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ 

 
  
 Hello Juan,  We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds.

合并来自工单4729  
      主题: Re: Order #SSN2709, how did it go?  
      描述:  ﻿
 
 It came with NO brackets to attach the haptics to the pedals!!!! The web clearly states that the haptics come with two brackets (one for throttle brake and one for clutch). How is it possible. How can i use it with no brackets?!?! I bought both the pedals and the haptics in the same order. This is unbelievable!!! No quickguide, no accesories, no nothing as stated in the included packet for each package/accesory list. SEND IT IMMEDIATELY!!!  Now ill have to pay new customs taxes, use one of only five courier posta that my country allows for this. This is really really bad.  
   
   
   
  
 
  El 9 oct 2025, a la(s) 4:33 p. m., SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> escribió:  
 
 
  ﻿




 
 Hello Juan,  We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Hi Juan Manuel O’Donnell,  Hello, we’ve just received your message. Please note that the review invitation was automatically sent by the system. We’ve just learned that some accessories might be missing from your package. Could you please take a photo of the items inside the motor package for us? Also, kindly check the back side of the foam insert to see if the two motor brackets, the quick guide, and the screw set are there. If these items are indeed missing after checking both sides of the packaging, we will ship the replacements to you immediately today.

Checked it several times. as i bought the feet plate it was below everything else. Ill send pics in my next email. But i got no accesory for the haptics , every bag screw wrench bolt is for the pedals. El 10 oct 2025, a la(s) 10:01 p. m., service@simsonn.com escribió: ﻿

Hi Juan Manuel O’Donnell,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Please use the electronic manual for the time being.

Hi, please do you have estimated time of arrival (it doesnt say in the tracking link) and what courier was chosen so i can prepare my customs declaration.



    El sábado, 11 de octubre de 2025, 04:17:11 a.m. GMT-3, service@simsonn.com
Hello, we are using China Post for the initial leg of the shipment. We are unaware which international courier will handle the final delivery stage. The estimated arrival date is the 24th.

4738:4206036

 <VAM Pro说明书.pdf>
Hi Juan Manuel O’Donnell,  Please provide a photo of the entire bracket so I can check whether the installation method differs from the standard setup.

Hi can you please tell/send me the invoice for the accesories shipped. Just received notification from the local EMS shipping provider and I have to declar Price and Shipping so that i pay the corresponding taxes.


    El martes, 14 de octubre de 2025, 03:38:49 a.m. GMT-3, service@simsonn.com

Hello,  Thank you for your message. Since this shipment only includes replacement accessories, no separate invoice was issued for it.  To help you with the customs declaration, please provide the chat record related to this reshipment and the product link below: ? https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-haptic-reactor-mounting-brackets  We hope this information helps with your customs process. Please let us know if you need any additional details.  Best regards, The Simsonn Team

Easy solved. I just inverted the profiles so that I attached the front/back edge of the pedal baseplate to the profile running in the same direction instead of fixing the sides of the baseplate to the profiles.

    El miércoles, 22 de octubre de 2025, 12:44:05 a.m. GMT-3, service@simsonn.com

Hi, where can i get the electronic manual from? I checked the web but only found the pedals configuration manual, not the haptics.


    El lunes, 13 de octubre de 2025, 06:16:19 a.m. GMT-3, service@simsonn.com
Hi Juan Manuel O’Donnell,    This is the manual for Vam pro. If you need anything else, feel free to contact me anytime.
